title.value: Estimation of the parameters of milking machines used at loose management of cows
Оценка параметров доильных установок, применяемых при беспривязном содержании коров

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kazheko, O.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)
Yakovchik, N.S., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: A comparative evaluation of the parameters of milking machines for loose management of cows was carried out. Researches are lead on republic modern industrial complexes with loose housing system for cows of cows and the

of milk most typical for Belarus. It was determined that compared with the conventional system the quick release system allows to saves 5-6 minutes for milking cows every 100 minutes. It was determined that the highest performance had milking machine
(2x17) - 140 cows/hour. When milking cows at plant
(2x14) 120 cows were milked in 1 hour. Performance of milking machines
companies (2x16) - 116 and 110 cows/hour were milked, respectively. In the milking plant
with a complete set of twoway milking machines showed performance of 130 cows/hour. Worst performance was shown by plant
